H0.text: who 's flag is red white and green. Italy

H1.text: who 's flag is red white and green. Mexico

H2.text: who 's flag is red white and green. Nigeria

H3.text: who 's flag is red white and green. Hungary

A4.text: The Italian flag ... is a flag featuring three equally sized vertical pales of green, white and red

A5.text: The Hungarian flag has the same colours as the Italian one, but on the Magyar banner the red, white and green tricolour is arranged horizontally

A6.text: The national flag of Mexico ... is a vertical tricolor of green, white, and red with the national coat of arms charged in the center of the white stripe.
